sect1.title: Lift
sect1.para: The maximum weight that a character can lift easily is given by the Lift value from the Strength table. When Lifting weight, the following equation is used:
For every increase in weight equal to Load Step, increase TD by 1.
For every decrease in weight equal to Load Step, decrease TD by 1.

para.literal: Final Lift TD = Lift TD + ( (Weight - Lift) / Load Step )
